extendedInfo.description: Etable is a social platform bringing together food lovers from around the worldEtable helps you share where, what & with whom you eat. It gets better as you use it with all your friends.If you love to eat and enjoy sharing your experiences, then Etable is made just for you.â Know whatâs happening in the foodie community. Donât see what you like? Invite a     few friends and see the magic. â Find the places nearby based on your tastes and current location.â Share where you are eating, what you are eating and how it is, all in 3 simple steps. â And now the best part - donât find your favorite eating joints? You can add your favorites and get rewarded for your awesomeness.â Well, Google has taken Search to a different level. While we are still working to get there, we have provided a basic search that helps you find your favorite eating joints quickly. What else can Etable do for you?â Help you meet & interact with like-minded foodies.â Instantly connect with your friends from Facebook, Twitter & Foursquare.â Get personalized recommendations from you social circles based on what you & your friends like. We call this a "Social Recommendation".â Reward you for sharing your knowledge about food. If you have a high FQ (Food Quotient), then this is the only place to be â Ever got rewarded for sharing on Wikipedia or Facebook?â Show what your friends are up to with quick notifications & updates on "Food Feed".â Gives you the ability to share photos of your favorite restaurantsEtable is a one stop destination for all the food lovers to help you discover, explore and share your food related experiences.Get started today!

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Does not work on my city Jyv\303\244skyl\303\244. UI glitches on HTC One. Poor...
reviews.author: Roni Laukkarinen

reviews.title: Great Concept
reviews.comment: Good Concept guys. Love the UI as well. Please release a notification manager so i dont get them too often. Love the way you guys have integrated social media into the app. You guys will go a long way!!
reviews.author: Harsha M V

reviews.title: Socially brilliant
reviews.comment: Have been using this app for a week now.  The UI is really neat and just love the verbiages used... like X was \"spotted\" at KFC :D.  Also the home screen gives you an easy way to see what your friends have been up to that week and the pictures of restaurants make it visually appealing.  Cons: The number of restaurants is limited. But I am sure in the coming days they will improve it. Then I will be back to add another star for this app.
reviews.author: Karthik Narayan

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: A perfect useful app for foodies...have covered most of the restaurants and some helpful reviews as well...love the loyalty concept...gets you hooked :)
reviews.author: sreechand nambiar

reviews.title: My plate on Etable!
reviews.comment: From the name to the UX and simply awsome social features...i LOVE this app! Finally a cool way to tell my friends about the fun hangouts, yummy food and sometimes even grievances about restaurants! I like the one touch approach to reviews, check-ins and food feeds! Looking forward to more interesting & social features that would make eating out more fun with this little handy app!
reviews.author: Pooja Sriram

reviews.title: A sleek app
reviews.comment: I like the usability & recommend this app to everyone.
reviews.author: Siddharth Menon

reviews.title: Excellent App for Foodies!!!
reviews.comment: Very useful App to explore restaurants based on cuisine, price range, locality and many more with amazing and a user friendly UI.
reviews.author: Ashwin Subedar

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: This app is really fantastic works great with samsung galaxy note 2.
reviews.author: Balajee Annamalai

reviews.title: Superb app...
reviews.comment: Great way to find restaurants.... I also liked the way we can update our status... Love it!
reviews.author: manasa kalamdani

reviews.title: Finally
reviews.comment: Must have app for a Foodie
reviews.author: ajay kesarkar

reviews.title: Love the concept!
reviews.comment: Cool user interface and great in app experience!!  Look forward to the next update
reviews.author: Anirudh Khusape
